TEXT.TITLE: S.P.I. SUSPENSION <SPILF> WINS CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: S.P.I. Suspension and Parts Industries Ltd said it won four multi-year contracts from the U.S. Army worth 34.5 mln dlrs. The contracts, for wheels on U.S. Army vehicles, will run for five years beginning 1987. Reuter
